title: Interview | AU comfortable as small finance bank, ready to convert to universal bank if RBI wants, says... - Moneycontrol
content: Interview | AU comfortable as small finance bank, ready to convert to universal bank if RBI wants, says...  Moneycontrol
description: "There are certain challenges like inflation, interest rate cycles, geopolitical issues, but I don't think those are bigger than what we have faced in the last two years," Agarwal said.
